title: Crashing
body: Every time I que up it bug splats me over and over soon as the game starts i reconnect and reconnect but it does the same thing i dont even reach loading screen and now i have leaver buster also and lost Lp  [IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2lu8jno.png[/IMG]  I reinstalled and everything i tried to run it on both legacy and alpha client always fail im missing some fun time urf and its breaking my heart  [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/16gakl.png[/IMG]   can someone respond fast please what do i do im bored....!!!!!!!!

replies.body: any freaking help from an admin or something to fix this its been three days tbh

Seconded, although I simply get kicked out of queue over and over; whatever they were trying
to accomplish by making a new client when this is what we get is beyond me. 
Yes, I read all the flowery blubbergush, but fact is the
game hates the new client and the smallest tweak seems to have the potential to make it all unplayable!
From day one, it's been inferior in any and all ways from what we had before.

Hate to rant but this really just came to a head for me.
My game keeps crashing as well.
